p: For polyphenol oxidase (PPO, EC 1.10.3.1) activity, the enzyme extract was mixed with 2.4 mL of 20 mM catechol in 50 mM sodium phosphate buffer (pH 7.0). Absorbance was measured at 420 nm, and one unit of enzyme activity was defined as an increase in absorbance at 0.01 min âˆ’1. Results were expressed as units of enzyme per mg of protein [ 46].
